title: Discovery Learning-Based Mobile Microlearning Course for GPS Educational Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic GPS concepts and foundational knowledge of language education
context.additional_context: Providing content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, with project-based assessments applicable to practical settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain GPS instructional design principles with 80%+ accuracy through discovery learning strategies.
Learners can practice three or more GPS design frameworks for mobile-based language education.
Learners can critically apply discovery learning theory to create context-specific GPS instructional design proposals.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
